MessageTemplateOptions.Email: Join me in earning cash for our school by using the Carton Caps app. It’s an easy way to make a difference. All you have to do is buy Carton Caps participating products (like Cheerios!) and scan your grocery receipt. Carton Caps are worth $.10 each and they add up fast! Twice a year, our school receives a check to help pay for whatever we need – equipment, supplies or experiences the kids love!
